Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 133rd overall pick, by Malibu in 1964...
Injured on 8/10/1965 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 7/30/1969 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/4/1971, off Raymond Wills (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/1971, off Mark Sinodinos (CBC)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Second Base in 1972...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 2/9/1979 to a 1-year deal worth $444,600 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/1/1980 to a 4-year deal worth $627,000 per year...
